content.rendered:
With Maple Parking Meet and Greet you know your car is in safe hands. Our car parks are Park Mark accredited and have CCTV, flood lights and security fences. All our drivers are fully insured to drive your car between the airport and the car park.

WE’RE PROUD TO WORK WITH…

GATWICK AIRPORT APPROVED OPERATOR SCHEME

Maple Parking Meet and Greet is a member of the Gatwick Airport Approved Operator Scheme, which includes having been audited and inspected by Gatwick Airport, Sussex & Surrey Police and West Sussex Trading Standards to ensure we meet customer service standards.

AIRPORT VALET PARKING CONTRACTORS ASSOCIATION

One of only a handful of companies who are members of The Airport Valet Parking Contractors Association – or the AVPCA for short. This association protects customers against rogue airport parking firms and bad practices in airport parking. It requires that it’s members meet certain basic standards such as; full liability insurance, 5 years trading history and certified, insured drivers/offices. We are proud to be a member of this association.

BRITISH PARKING ASSOCIATION

Maple Parking is a member of the British Parking Association (BPA) – membership no. 30302.

INDEPENDENT AIRPORT PARKING ASSOCIATION

We have recently added another accreditation to our list and are now members of the IAPA.

IAPA’s main aim is to promote best practice and raise standards in the provision of airport parking services. It also seeks to ensure that the role of the independent airport parking industry is fully understood and properly reflected in the development plans for UK airports and their associated surface access strategies and, more broadly, that the industry’s voice is heard in policy debates.

2019 Feefo Gold Trusted Service Award

Feefo have announced their annual Trusted Service Awards for 2019 which recognises businesses like ours for delivering exceptional experiences, as rated by our real customers. Using this genuine review system has helped so much that Feefo themselves have recognised Maple Parking, and they have granted us their

We carry the West Sussex Trading Standards “Buy With Confidence Award” at Gatwick Airport.
Gatwick Buy With Confidence Award from West Sussex Trading Standards.
